"Skill Points":
"\"Class Skills\" are the particular abilities available to each class, which can have useful effects such as being usable in battle or enhancing your parameters.

You can learn Class Skills by spending \"Skill Points\" at the \"Class Counter\" in the Gate Area.

You can earn Skill Points by levelling up, or by completing certain Client Orders."

"Class Skills have a tree-like structure, and some skills must be unlocked by raising other skills to certain levels.

Check what Class Skills are available to your Class and use your Skill Points carefully. If you have trouble deciding, the \"Set Recommended\" option may be convenient.

â€»Some Class Skills have special unlock conditions, such as reaching a certain level in that class."
